animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal
🥜 People often feed me at the zoo
💧 I use my nose to spray water

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I like to drink milk
🧶 I like to play with string
😴 I sleep a lot

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth
🌍 You can find me in Africa
🌿 My long neck helps me reach the best food

animal.question: I live in the water and have scales. I swim with my fins. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I breathe using gills
🐡 Some people keep me as a pet in a tank
🌊 I am a common food source in many cultures

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse
🏞️ My stripes help me blend in with the tall grass
🐎 A group of us is called a dazzle

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. I have long ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a popular pet
🌿 I love to eat vegetables
🐰 My babies are called kits

animal.question: I live in a shell and move very slowly. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I carry my house on my back
🥬 I enjoy eating leafy greens
🐌 I am known for my slow pace

animal.question: I have a big mane and roar loudly. I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am a big cat
👑 I am a symbol of courage
🐾 I live in Africa

animal.question: I build dams and live in lodges. I have big teeth and a flat tail. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to chew on trees
🏠 My home is made of sticks and mud
🦷 My teeth are always growing

animal.question: I am a marsupial from Australia who carries my baby in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am a symbol of Australia
🦘 I am known for hopping
🤱 My baby is called a joey

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. I make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 You might feel me when you wake up early
🪴 Plants love me!
🌿 I am made of tiny water droplets

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep in the sky
☁️ I am made of water droplets or ice crystals
🌤️ I can block the sun

weather.question: I am the opposite of hot.  I can make you shiver. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 You might find me in a freezer
🧣 You wear warm clothes when I am around
🥶 I am a low temperature

weather.question: I come after rain, and I am colorful, arching across the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors!
☀️ You can only see me when the sun is out AND it's raining
✨ I appear as an arc

weather.question: I am a storm with strong winds that spin. I can cause a lot of damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I look like a cone coming from a cloud
🏡 You need to take shelter when I am near
💨 I am measured on the Fujita scale

weather.question: I am frozen rain. I can be fun to catch in your mouth, but watch out, they melt! What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am small balls of ice
⚾ I am bigger than snowflakes
🤕 Sometimes I hurt when they fall from the sky

weather.question: I am a big storm over the ocean with strong winds that swirl around an 'eye'. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I form over warm ocean waters
🧭 We use special names to identify each one
🌀 My winds spin counter-clockwise in the Northern Hemisphere

weather.question: I am a season that comes after summer and before winter. The leaves change color and fall from the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 Pumpkins are a popular symbol of me
🍂 You might wear a costume during my holidays
🧤 The temperature starts to get cooler

weather.question: I'm a long period with very little or no rain. Plants and animals struggle to survive. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 The ground becomes very dry
🔥 Wildfires are more common when I happen
🏜️ Rivers and lakes can dry up

weather.question: I am a sudden, dangerous flow of water over land that is normally dry. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ Heavy rain can cause me
🏠 I can damage houses and roads
🌊 I can happen after a river overflows
